verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> be-mid-Bar in the wilderness סִינַ֖י <WH5514> si-Nai of Sinai בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> be-'O-hel in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed; of the congregation בְּאֶחָד֩ <WH259> be-'e-Chad on the first לַחֹ֨דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh month הַשֵּׁנִ֜י <WH8145> hash-she-Ni [day] of the second בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> bash-sha-Nah year הַשֵּׁנִ֗ית <WH8145> hash-she-Nit, in the second לְצֵאתָ֛ם <WH3318> le-tze-Tam after they were come out מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

שְׂא֗וּ <WH5375> se-'U, Take אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- רֹאשׁ֙ <WH7218> roSh ye the sum כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of all עֲדַ֣ת <WH5712> 'a-Dat of all the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> 'a-vo-Tam; of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> be-mis-Par with the number שֵׁמ֔וֹת <WH8034> she-Mot, of [their] names כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- every זָכָ֖ר <WH2145> za-Char every male לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָֽם׃ <WH1538> le-gul-ge-lo-Tam. by their polls

מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> mib-Ben old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim From twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> sha-Nah years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> va-Ma'-lah, and upward כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- whoever יֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> yo-Tze all that are able to go forth צָבָ֖א <WH6635> tza-Va to war בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> be-Yis-ra-'El; in Israel תִּפְקְד֥וּ <WH6485> tif-ke-Du shall number אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> 'o-Tam לְצִבְאֹתָ֖ם <WH6635> le-tziv-'o-Tam them by their armies אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you וְאַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> ve-'a-ha-Ron. thou and Aaron

וְאִתְּכֶ֣ם <WH854> ve-'it-te-Chem for יִהְי֔וּ <WH1961> yih-Yu, shall be a אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish And with you there shall be a man אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> 'ish of every לַמַּטֶּ֑ה <WH4294> lam-mat-Teh; tribe אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every one רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> rosh head לְבֵית־ <WH1004> le-veit- of the house אֲבֹתָ֖יו <WH1> 'a-vo-Tav of his fathers הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. he

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> ve-'El-leh These שְׁמ֣וֹת <WH8034> she-Mot And these [are] the names הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> ha-'a-na-Shim, of the men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who יַֽעַמְד֖וּ <WH5975> ya-'am-Du that shall stand אִתְּכֶ֑ם <WH854> 'it-te-Chem; for לִרְאוּבֵ֕ן <WH7205> lir-'u-Ven with you of [the tribe of] Reuben אֱלִיצ֖וּר <WH468> 'e-li-Tzur Elizur בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son שְׁדֵיאֽוּר׃ <WH7707> she-dei-'Ur. of Shedeur
לְשִׁמְע֕וֹן <WH8095> le-shim-'on Of Simeon שְׁלֻמִיאֵ֖ל <WH8017> she-lu-mi-'El Shelumiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son צוּרִֽישַׁדָּֽי׃ <WH6701> tzu-Ri-shad-Dai. of Zurishaddai
לִֽיהוּדָ֕ה <WH3063> li-hu-Dah Of Judah נַחְשׁ֖וֹן <WH5177> nach-Shon Nahshon בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עַמִּינָדָֽב׃ <WH5992> 'am-mi-na-Dav. of Amminadab
לְיִ֨שָּׂשכָ֔ר <WH3485> le-Yis-so-sh-Char, Of Issachar נְתַנְאֵ֖ל <WH5417> ne-tan-'El Nethaneel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son צוּעָֽר׃ <WH6686> tzu-'Ar. of Zuar
לִזְבוּלֻ֕ן <WH2074> liz-vu-Lun Of Zebulun אֱלִיאָ֖ב <WH446> 'e-li-'Av Eliab בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son חֵלֹֽן׃ <WH2497> che-Lon. of Helon

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei Of the children יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> yo-Sef, of Joseph לְאֶפְרַ֕יִם <WH669> le-'ef-Ra-yim of Ephraim אֱלִישָׁמָ֖ע <WH476> 'e-li-sha-Ma' Elishama בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עַמִּיה֑וּד <WH5989> 'am-mi-Hud; of Ammihud לִמְנַשֶּׁ֕ה <WH4519> lim-nash-Sheh of Manasseh גַּמְלִיאֵ֖ל <WH1583> gam-li-'El Gamaliel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son פְּדָהצֽוּר׃ <WH6301> pe-da-h-Tzur. of Pedahzur
לְבִ֨נְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> le-Vin-ya-Min, Of Benjamin אֲבִידָ֖ן <WH27> 'a-vi-Dan Abidan בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son גִּדְעֹנִֽי׃ <WH1441> gid-'o-Ni. of Gideoni
לְדָ֕ן <WH1835> le-Dan Of Dan אֲחִיעֶ֖זֶר <WH295> 'a-chi-'E-zer Ahiezer בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עַמִּֽישַׁדָּֽי׃ <WH5996> 'am-Mi-shad-Dai. of Ammishaddai
לְאָשֵׁ֕ר <WH836> le-'a-Sher Of Asher פַּגְעִיאֵ֖ל <WH6295> pag-'i-'El Pagiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עָכְרָֽן׃ <WH5918> 'a-che-Ran. of Ocran
לְגָ֕ד <WH1410> le-Gad Of Gad אֶלְיָסָ֖ף <WH460> 'el-ya-Saf Eliasaph בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son דְּעוּאֵֽל׃ <WH1845> de-'u-'El. of Deuel
לְנַ֨פְתָּלִ֔י <WH5321> le-Naf-ta-Li, Of Naphtali אֲחִירַ֖ע <WH299> 'a-chi-Ra' Ahira בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עֵינָֽן׃ <WH5881> 'ei-Nan. of Enan

אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These; קְרִיאֵי ke-ri-'ei כקְרוּאֵ֣י <WH7148> ke-ru-'Ei famous קהָעֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah, of the congregation נְשִׂיאֵ֖י <WH5387> ne-si-'Ei princes מַטּ֣וֹת <WH4294> mat-Tot of the tribes אֲבוֹתָ֑ם <WH1> a-vo-Tam; of their fathers רָאשֵׁ֛י <WH7218> ra-Shei heads אַלְפֵ֥י <WH505> 'al-Fei of thousands יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El Israel הֵֽם׃ <WH1992> Hem. in

וַיִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach took מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> ve-'a-ha-Ron; and Aaron אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <WH582> ha-'a-na-Shim these men הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh, these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who נִקְּב֖וּ <WH5344> nik-ke-Vu which are expressed בְּשֵׁמֽוֹת׃ <WH8034> be-she-Mot. by [their] names

וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָעֵדָ֜ה <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah all the congregation הִקְהִ֗ילוּ <WH6950> hik-Hi-lu, together בְּאֶחָד֙ <WH259> be-'e-Chad on the first לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh month הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> hash-she-Ni, [day] of the second וַיִּתְיַֽלְד֥וּ <WH3205> vai-yit-yal-Du and they declared their pedigrees עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- in מִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> 'a-vo-Tam; of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> be-mis-Par according to the number שֵׁמ֗וֹת <WH8034> she-Mot, of the names מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> mib-Ben old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim from twenty שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> sha-Nah years וָמַ֖עְלָה <WH4605> va-Ma'-lah and upward לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָֽם׃ <WH1538> le-gul-ge-lo-Tam. by their polls

כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh As the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh; Moses וַֽיִּפְקְדֵ֖ם <WH6485> vai-yif-ke-Dem so he numbered בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> be-mid-Bar them in the wilderness סִינָֽי׃ <WH5514> si-Nai. of Sinai פ Peh

וַיִּהְי֤וּ <WH1961> vai-yih-Yu become בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- And the children רְאוּבֵן֙ <WH7205> re-'u-Ven of Reuben בְּכֹ֣ר <WH1060> be-Chor eldest son יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, Israel's תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <WH8435> tol-do-Tam by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> 'a-vo-Tam; of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֤ר <WH4557> be-mis-Par according to the number שֵׁמוֹת֙ <WH8034> she-mOt of the names לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָ֔ם <WH1538> le-gul-ge-lo-Tam, by their polls כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- every זָכָ֗ר <WH2145> za-Char, every male מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> mib-Ben old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> sha-Nah years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> va-Ma'-lah, and upward כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol whoever יֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> yo-Tze all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <WH6635> tza-Va. to war

פְּקֻדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6485> pe-ku-dei-Hem Those that were numbered לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh of them [even] of the tribe רְאוּבֵ֑ן <WH7205> re-'u-Ven; of Reuben שִׁשָּׁ֧ה <WH8337> shish-Shah and six וְאַרְבָּעִ֛ים <WH705> ve-'ar-ba-'Im [were] forty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> va-cha-Mesh and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> me-'ot. hundred פ Peh

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei Of the children שִׁמְע֔וֹן <WH8095> shim-'on, of Simeon תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <WH8435> tol-do-Tam by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> 'a-vo-Tam; of their fathers פְּקֻדָ֗יו <WH6485> pe-ku-Dav, those that were numbered בְּמִסְפַּ֤ר <WH4557> be-mis-Par of them according to the number שֵׁמוֹת֙ <WH8034> she-mOt of the names לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָ֔ם <WH1538> le-gul-ge-lo-Tam, by their polls כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- every זָכָ֗ר <WH2145> za-Char, every male מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> mib-Ben old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> sha-Nah years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> va-Ma'-lah, and upward כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol whoever יֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> yo-Tze all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <WH6635> tza-Va. to war

פְּקֻדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6485> pe-ku-dei-Hem Those that were numbered לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh of them [even] of the tribe שִׁמְע֑וֹן <WH8095> shim-'on; of Simeon תִּשְׁעָ֧ה <WH8672> tish-'Ah and nine וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <WH2572> va-cha-mish-Shim [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand וּשְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> u-she-Losh and three מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> me-'ot. hundred פ Peh

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei Of the children גָ֔ד <WH1410> Gad, of Gad תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <WH8435> tol-do-Tam by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> 'a-vo-Tam; of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> be-mis-Par according to the number שֵׁמ֗וֹת <WH8034> she-Mot, of the names מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> mib-Ben old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> sha-Nah years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> va-Ma'-lah, and upward כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol whoever יֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> yo-Tze all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <WH6635> tza-Va. to war

פְּקֻדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6485> pe-ku-dei-Hem Those that were numbered לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh of them [even] of the tribe גָ֑ד <WH1410> Gad; of Gad חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah and five וְאַרְבָּעִים֙ <WH705> ve-'ar-ba-'Im [were] forty אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef, thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> ve-Shesh six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred וַחֲמִשִּֽׁים׃ <WH2572> va-cha-mish-Shim. and fifty פ Peh

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei Of the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <WH8435> tol-do-Tam by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> 'a-vo-Tam; of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> be-mis-Par according to the number שֵׁמֹ֗ת <WH8034> she-Mot, of the names מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> mib-Ben old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> sha-Nah years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> va-Ma'-lah, and upward כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol whoever יֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> yo-Tze all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <WH6635> tza-Va. to war
